amendment.description: To provide for continued support by the New Mexico National Guard for the performance of the vehicle and cargo inspection activities of the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3639 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3639 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9184; text: CR S9184) To provide for continued support by the New Mexico National Guard for the performance of the vehicle and cargo inspection activities of the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3639 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3639 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
